content:
Key Enum

In this Article

Specifies the possible key values on a keyboard.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter(typeof(System.Windows.Input.KeyConverter))]
[System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer(typeof(System.Windows.Input.KeyValueSerializer))]
public enum Key

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • ValueType
  • System.Enum
  • Key

Remarks

Information pertaining to key input can be obtained in several different ways in WPF. Key-related events, such as KeyDown and KeyUp, provide key state information through the ventArgs object that is passed to the event handler. Key state information can also be obtained through the static methods on the oard class, such as oard.IsKeyUp(System.Windows.Input.Key) and oard.GetKeyStates(System.Windows.Input.Key). The oard class reports the current state of the keyboard.

Fields

A

The A key.
AbntC1

The ABNT_C1 (Brazilian) key.
AbntC2

The ABNT_C2 (Brazilian) key.

The Add key.
